author: fielding
msg: Change the remove_dot_segments algorithm so that it preserves
the distinction between base paths that begin with "/" and
those that do not.  Essentially, this is the same as treating
the first segment as a root label if the URI does not have "/"
at its path root.  This only changes the handling of very weird
